00029 namespace mlpack {
00030 namespace perceptron {
00031 
00032 class SimpleWeightUpdate
00033 {
00034  public:
00047   void UpdateWeights(const arma::mat& trainData,
00048                      arma::mat& weightVectors,
00049                      const size_t labelIndex,
00050                      const size_t vectorIndex,
00051                      const size_t rowIndex,
00052                      const arma::rowvec& D)
00053   {
00054     weightVectors.row(rowIndex) = weightVectors.row(rowIndex) - 
00055                                   D(labelIndex) * trainData.col(labelIndex).t();
00056 
00057     weightVectors.row(vectorIndex) = weightVectors.row(vectorIndex) +
00058                                      D(labelIndex) * trainData.col(labelIndex).t();
00059   }
00060 };

00063 }; // namespace mlpack

00065 #endif
